page.title: 11THE KIRKBY STEPHEN JAZZ BAND
page.content: The {Jazz Band }was started in 1980.On parade the band is announced as Kirkby Stephen {Legionaires.} We go out most Saturdays from May to September and some Sundays. We compete in{carnivals} with other bands, mainly at places in the north east such as Chester-le- street Durham and Redcar.We usually leave early in a coach.There are about 25{Legionaires.}The youngest are 6 and the oldest is 18. We all march and some play instruments such as {kazoo { glockenspiel}and {drums.}We are judged for our playing and marching and win trophies and medals.I've won 99 medals.On the first Sunday in August we have a carnival in Kirkby Stephen when we march through the town from the Croglin Hotel to the Grammar School.But this year we are going to march back along Faraday Rd.and up Westgarth Rd.ending at the Rugby Club.
